  proposition: Optimal policies tend to seek power.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    
    entity-entity relationships:

  proposition: Alex Turner and Prasad Tadepalli found that parametrically retargetable decision-makers tend to seek power.

topic: AI Interpretability Research

  proposition: Chandan Singh and researchers rethought interpretability in the era of large language models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Chandan Singh|RESEARCHES|Large Language Models
    Chandan Singh|RESEARCHES|Interpretability

  proposition: Neel Nanda and team developed progress measures for grokking via mechanistic interpretability.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Neel Nanda|DEVELOPS|Progress Measures
    Neel Nanda|USES|Mechanistic Interpretability

  proposition: Arthur Conmy and colleagues worked towards automated circuit discovery for mechanistic interpretability.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Arthur Conmy|RESEARCHES|Automated Circuit Discovery
    Arthur Conmy|USES|Mechanistic Interpretability

  proposition: Roland S Zimmermann, Thomas Klein, and Wieland Brendel found that scale alone does not improve mechanistic interpretability in vision models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Roland S Zimmermann|COLLABORATES_WITH|Thomas Klein

    entity-attribute relationships:
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Daking Rai|RESEARCHES|Transformer-based Language Models
    Daking Rai|CONDUCTS|Mechanistic Interpretability Review

  proposition: Leonard Bereska and Efstratios Gavves reviewed mechanistic interpretability for AI safety.

    entity-attribute relationships:

topic: AI Security and Jailbreaking Research

  entities:
    Xinyue Shen|Researcher
    Rusheb Shah|Researcher
    Xuan Li|Researcher
    Anselm Paulus|Researcher

  proposition: Xinyue Shen and colleagues characterized and evaluated in-the-wild jailbreak prompts on large language models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Xinyue Shen|RESEARCHES|Large Language Models
    Xinyue Shen|EVALUATES|Jailbreak Prompts

  proposition: Rusheb Shah and researchers explored scalable and transferable black-box jailbreaks for language models via persona modulation.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Rusheb Shah|RESEARCHES|Language Models
    Rusheb Shah|EXPLORES|Black-box Jailbreaks

  proposition: Xuan Li and team developed DeepInception to hypnotize large language models to be jailbreakers.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Xuan Li|DEVELOPS|DeepInception
    Xuan Li|RESEARCHES|Large Language Models

  proposition: Anselm Paulus and colleagues created AdvPrompter for fast adaptive adversarial prompting for large language models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Anselm Paulus|CREATES|AdvPrompter
    Anselm Paulus|RESEARCHES|Large Language Models
